item.title: CVE-2019-16449|2024-08-05T01:17:39.569Z -- adobe -- adobe%20acrobat%20and%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions , 2019.021.20056 and earlier, 2017.011.30152 and earlier, 2017.011.30155 and earlier version, 2017.011.30152 and earlier, and 2015.006.30505 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure .
